es.upm.dit.cnvr_fcon.bank2022.common

Class ConvertsByte

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upm.dit.cnvr_fcon.bank2022.common.ConvertsByte

  • public class ConvertsByte
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functions for converting from the operation bank, string, and integer to an array of bytes, and vice versa
    Author:
    aalonso
